# RealityViewCameraContent.Body

**Structure**

The default view contents of a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView] using [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewCameraContent].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Body<Placeholder> where Placeholder : View
```

## Overview

You don’t directly create instances of this type because [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView] creates them for you.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
